local_intent: Verify bread is visible, localize it, approach and align to it with tight tolerance, then confirm proximity achieved.
assumptions: Bread is detectable in the scene
Workspace near bread is clear for approach
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase of GLOBAL_BT: checks visibility, detects bread, performs ApproachAndAlign with tolerance 0.01 and timeout 2000, then verifies proximity using IsAt.
